entry.title: Hello Blog
entry.content:
I happy to announce my blog birth.

It's about all the fucking stuff i face with during my programmer life. (There is a lot of things aside from programming that i don't like, but there is to much for a blog).

This is for me, and i don't sure it will be really public sometime. I will collect here observations about different technology stuff (that i don't like), about it behaviour in different situations (obviuosly fucking situations), some interesting issues, some maybe useful solutions...

Yahooo!!
